attributes.action: Enable volunteers to contribute 1% of their salary to the NHS during this time.
attributes.additional_details: The people of this country feel a sense of obligation to do all they can to support each other, and in particular to support the NHS during this difficult time.
attributes.background: Make it possible for citizens to contribute further to the NHS while we tackle the COVID-19 virus.

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Volunteers are not normally paid so wouldn't receive a salary. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
